name: Patchwork Battles - Groundbreaking New Customizable RPG
blurb: A groundbreaking new single player RPG with unparalleled customization, discovery,  and character development!

rewards.reward: No Reward

NEWBIE APPRENTICE: Want to see your name in the Patchwork Battles credit roll? We thought so, so we're going to add you to them! You'll also receive access to the Patchwork Battles developer forum along with an "Apprentice Level" Kickstarter forum badge! We'll also unlock the Patchwork Battles digital download bundle for you. This includes the Patchwork Battles soundtrack and wallpapers!\r\n\r\n(In-game stuff delivered at Patchwork release, obviously.)

STUDENT APPRENTICE: Love leveling up? Then this is the level for you as you'll get a permanent 5% experience boost for all your Mimics! You'll also get 5 units of rare in-game currency which can be used to purchase boosts, upgrades, new skins, and more!  We're also going to give you access to Patchwork Battles beta builds! + PREVIOUS REWARDS

JUNIOR APPRENTICE: You enjoy getting loot, right? Yeah, we thought so and that's why with this tier you'll get a nice shiny permanent 5% increase to all drop rates inside Patchwork Battles. And since you love loot so much, we're also going to throw in a set of awesomely unique Patchwork Battles trading cards. There are 8 total, one for each class! + PREVIOUS REWARDS

JUNIOR APPRENTICE (DIGITAL): You enjoy getting loot, right? Yeah, we thought so and that's why with this tier you'll get a nice shiny permanent 5% increase to all drop rates inside Patchwork Battles. You're also going to 2 Kickstarter only Chameleon Weapons (Your choice of weapon types). These super awesome Chameleon Weapons change appearance as your Mimic levels up. There are 5 different visual versions of each weapon! + PREVIOUS REWARDS

SENIOR APPRENTICE: So you're nearly done with your apprenticeship, awesome! Luckily for you, you get something for that! We're going to go ahead and give you a 5% increase to crafting critical chance. This will help you create some really epic stuff for your Mimcs! We'll also be sending you a signed physical copy of the Patchwork Battles soundtrack!! + PREVIOUS REWARDS

SENIOR APPRENTICE (DIGITAL): So you're nearly done with your apprenticeship, awesome! Luckily for you, you get something for that! We're going to go ahead and give you a 5% increase to crafting critical chance. This will help you create some really epic stuff for your Mimcs! We're also going to double the number of Chameleon Weapons you get. This raises your total to 4! Of course, type of weapons is your choice! + PREVIOUS REWARDS

NEWBIE ANIMATOR: So you got through apprenticeship and you are now a full fledged Animator, eh? Well you're in luck because this tier provides you with a special edition Mimic skin for 4 (FOUR!) of the 8 Mimic classes (you choose!). These skins are unique to the Kickstarter campaign!! We'll also upgrade your forum badge to the "Animator Level" badge. Why don't we double that rare currency you got, too (from 5 to 10)? Let's also give you Alpha access, how's that sound? You'll also get a Patchwork Battles Training Grounds poster which you can hang proudly in your office (or bedroom, or.. bathroom?) We've also set aside a special place in the credits for all ANIMATOR level backers! + PREVIOUS REWARDS

NEWBIE ANIMATOR (DIGITAL): So you got through apprenticeship and you are now a full fledged Animator, eh? Well you're in luck because this tier provides you with a special edition Mimic skin for 4 (FOUR!) of the 8 Mimic classes (you choose!). These skins are unique to the Kickstarter campaign!! We'll also upgrade your forum badge to the "Animator Level" badge. Why don't we double that rare currency you got, too (from 5 to 10)? Let's also give you Alpha access, how's that sound? The number of Chameleon Weapons will be doubled again, raising your total to 8! That's one for each type of weapon! We've also set aside a special place in the credits for all ANIMATOR level backers! + PREVIOUS REWARDS

LV5 ANIMATOR: Your animation skills are getting up there, eh? That's great! We're here to help you continue to harness those skills. We're giving you a Craftsman starter pack which will help get you started on crafting all those super cool Mimic patches. We'll also give you a free unlock for any Mimic classes we release as expansions and/or updates! + PREVIOUS REWARDS

LV10a ANIMATOR: The animation is strong with this one! We're going to give you more special edition Mimic skins, 4 more actually. This will bring you up to 8 total SE Mimic skins. That will cover all the Mimic classes at release. You'll also get to name something in the world of Patchwork. That could be a character, an enemy, an area, or an item! Live on, forever, in the world of Patchwork! + PREVIOUS REWARDS

LV10b ANIMATOR: The animation is strong with this one! We're going to give you more special edition Mimic skins, 4 more actually. This will bring you up to 8 total SE Mimic skins. That will cover all the Mimic classes at release. Since your'e not interested in naming something, we're going to throw in a second and third Craftsman Pack for in-game crafting goodness (that makes 3!). You'll also get a Spellbinder starter pack which will get you on the road to creating some truly impressive skills! + PREVIOUS REWARDS

MASTER ANIMATOR: You're really working up the animator chain and we're happy to reward you! We're going to give you a special edition Mimic skin for any and all future class releases! We'll also give you a free unlock of any expansion content released for Patchwork Battles! You'll also get a "Master Animator" in-game and forum badge! + PREVIOUS REWARDS (Does not include design or naming reward lower tiers, but instead the "extra item" tier of the same dollar amount)

EPIC ANIMATOR: Yeah, this will be epic. For starters, you're going to get 4 sets of epic armor crafting materials. These will let you craft epic armor for 4 classes of your choice (once you reach that level, of course). We're also going to double (again!) the amount of rare currency you get from 10 to 20: you'll be able to pick up all sorts of cool stuff!! We'll also give you a super-awesome monster part pack, full of regular and legendary monster parts! You'll also get an "Epic Animator" in-game and forum badge! + PREVIOUS REWARDS  (Does not include design or naming reward lower tiers, but instead the "extra item" tier of the same dollar amount)

ELITE ANIMATOR: Let's go ahead and make it so you can craft epic armor for all your classes. You're going to get 8 sets of epic armor crafting materials so that you can trick out all your Mimic classes. Let's not forget the uniquely awesome Patchwork Battles art book. You'll also get an "Elite Animator" in-game and forum badge! + PREVIOUS REWARDS  (Does not include design or naming reward lower tiers, but instead the "extra item" tier of the same dollar amount)

GRAND ANIMATOR A: Get a custom set of special edition epic armor for all your Mimic classes. That's 8 more free skins for your Mimics! This also includes free epic armor skins for any classes we release as expansion/update content. These skins are available only to those who participate in the Kickstarter campaign. We've also set aside a special place in the credits for all GRAND level backers! You'll also get a "Grand Animator" in-game and forum badge! Lastly you're going to get an actual crystal engraving of the class emblem of your choice! + PREVIOUS REWARDS  (Does not include design or naming reward lower tiers, but instead the "extra item" tier of the same dollar amount)

GRAND ANIMATOR B: Help design (visually) the epic armor for a single Mimic class. You'll also get a free skin for the armor you help design, and free special edition Epic skins for any classes released in the future! There are (currently) only 8 classes, so there are only 8 of these available. You can choose which class you want to help design, but choices are first come first served!  You'll also get a "Grand Animator" in-game and forum badge! + PREVIOUS REWARDS  (Does not include design or naming reward lower tiers, but instead the "extra item" tier of the same dollar amount)

GRAND MASTER ANIMATOR: Help design the base skills for a Mimic class (concept, naming, visuals, etc). There are only 8 classes available so there are only 8 of these available! You can pick which class skills you want to help design but choices are first come first served!  You'll also get a "Grand Master Animator" in-game and forum badge! + PREVIOUS REWARDS (Does not include design or naming reward lower tiers, but instead the "extra item" tier of the same dollar amount)

GRAND EPIC ANIMATOR: Ever want to help design a boss encounter in an RPG? Well now is your chance! Backers of this tier will get to work with me (over phone, skype, etc) to design a single boss encounter. This includes using your name (or a name you chose) as the boss' name, the visuals, skills the boss uses, any special mechanics, etc. Your name will also be featured on the battle victory screen of the boss you help design. You will live on in infamy, partly in thanks to Patchwork Battles! You'll also get a "Grand Epic Animator" in-game and forum badge! + PREVIOUS REWARDS (Does not include design or naming reward lower tiers, but instead the "extra item" tier of the same dollar amount)

GRAND ELITE ANIMATOR: First and foremost, you will get the undying love of a man who's working to make his childhood dream come true. That alone should be enough, but you'll also get one of the coolest things ever made: your very own hand-stitched Mimic. There is one of each class available. You will be able to chose which class you want. Class choice is on a first come, first serve basis. These will be delivered shortly before Patchwork Battles release. You'll also get a "Grand Elite Animator" in-game and forum badge! You also get every last thing on this list. (Does not include design or naming reward lower tiers, but instead the "extra item" tier of the same dollar amount)
